segments.text: Good morning ! Can you help me , please ? I'm looking for some books for my mother .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what kind of books does she like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She's very fond of detective stories ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see.Has she read any detective stories ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know if she's read this one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure , but she probably won't remember if she has ! She's very forgetful !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah ! She has a bad memory.How old is she ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest you take this book.It ' s very exciting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.That ' s a good idea.she likes exciting books.Can you suggest another one ?
segments.speaker: S2
